取り交わす: (とりかわす) - to exchange; to interchange
取り仕切る: (とりしきる) - to operate a business; to run a business; to manage all by oneself
取り付かれる: (とりつかれる) - to become obsessed with; to be possessed (by spirits, etc.); to be obsessive compulsive (OCD)
取り付く: (とりつく) - to cling to/to hold on to/to hold fast to; to grapple; to set about doing/to begin/to commence/to undertake; (of a demon, thought, emotion, etc.)  to take hold of/to possess/to haunt; to obtain a clue/to get a lead
取り付け: (とりつけ) - installation/mounting/furnishing/fitting; run (on a bank)/bank run

取り付け金具: (とりつけかなぐ) - mounting bracket; metal part for mounting; metal fitting
取り付け騒ぎ: (とりつけさわぎ) - a run on a bank
取り入る: (とりいる) - to make up to; to curry favour; to butter up

取り分ける: (とりわける) - to distribute; to apportion; to divide
取り切る: (とりきる) - to take completely/to deplete; to block off/to isolate

取り回し: (とりまわし) - {sumo} wrestler's belt used in a bout
取り回す: (とりまわす) - to rotate in one's hands; to treat; to manage; to dispose of

取り崩す: (とりくずす) - to demolish; to take away until nothing remains
取り巻き連: (とりまきれん) - one's followers or hangers-on

取り急ぎ: (とりいそぎ) - (often used in letters, e.g. in an opening phrase) in haste

取り憑く: (とりつく) - (of a demon, thought, emotion, etc.)  to take hold of; to possess; to haunt
